title: Shar's Spear of Evening
content: Shar's Spear of Night Legendary 4~11 Damage Versatile - Wielding With Both Hands 1d8 (1d6)+3 Piercing Shar's Blessing: You gain Advantage on Saving Throws while Lightly or Heavily Obscured. This weapon deals an additional 1d6 to creatures that are Lightly or Heavily Obscured. Blind Immunity: The wearer cannot be Blinded.
